articles.title: Scale AI lays off 200 employees: ‘We ramped up our GenAI capacity too quickly’
articles.description: Scale AI, an AI data labeling company, has announced that it’s laying off 14 percent of its workers after Meta acquired nearly half of the company.
articles.content:
is The Verge’s senior AI reporter. An AI beat reporter for more than five years, her work has also appeared in CNBC, MIT Technology Review, Wired UK, and other outlets.
